ComicInfo.Summary:
The Greene Family Farm was supposed to be the start of something new, or at least a place to end the survivorsâ€™ petty squabbles. But no. It's never that simple. Now Rick has a gun to his head.
This deluxe presentation in STUNNING FULL COLOR also features another installment of Cutting Room Floor and creator commentary.
